attributes.action: to set targets for the elected members of the house of commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time that the performance of all MP's be measured. Targets show be set by an indedendant body made up of a cross section of voters, (don't for get one fifth must be disabled in line with your own statistics). If any the MP's do not meet their targets they should be penalised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
